sections.heading: or credit of fees; when authorized
sections.text: (1) Except as otherwise provided in subsection (2) of this section and sections 60-3,104.01, 60-3,121, 60-3,122.02, 60-3,122.04, 60-3,135.01, 60-3,163.01, and 60-3,163.02, the registration shall expire and the registered owner or lessee may, by returning the regist
